entry.title: $2250 // Park Slope 1 Bedroom w/ Private Yard & Patio!
entry.content:
(Listing ID: cl-130806.2) (718) 930-7999


To view our walk through video, please visit our website at: http://destinationrealestate.com/listing?listing=8817-cl

This is a 1 Bedroom in the Park Slope area of Brooklyn. The Apartment Features Private Yard & Patio, Microwave, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless Steel Appliances, Eat-in-Kitchen, Tile Backsplash, Range / Oven, Storage and French Doors. Enjoy hosting parties & barbecues in your private outdoor space and growing organic veggies in the garden! Dogs and Cats Accepted on Approval. Heat, Hot Water, Gas, and Electric Included at an Additional Flat Rate!

Short Walk Access to local parks such as Prospect Park, Joesph Mayrose Park, Butterfly Gardens, the 6 15 Green. Attractions such as Brooklyn Glass, Gallery Players Theater, Greenwood Park Beergarden, New York Sports Club. And tons of local bars and restuarants.

Subway Access to the F, G, and R trains at 4th Avenue / 9th Street. 30 Minutes commute to Midtown Manhattan. 

Interior Dimensions:

  • Yard 46x20
  • Living Room 14x14
  • Bedroom 14x14
  • Kitchen 16x10
  • Storage 11x5

 

Where is this apartment in relation to other neighborhoods?North of Bay Ridge, Sunset Park, and Greenwood
South of Clinton Hill, Fort Greene, and Downtown Brooklyn
East of Red Hook, Carroll Gardens, Gowanus, Cobble Hill, Boerum Hill
West of Windsor Terrace and Prospect Heights
All apartments listed on this website have a broker's fee unless otherwise indicated. All information presented on thissite regarding real property, for sale, purchase, rental and/or financing is from sources deemed reliable. No warranty orrepresentation is made as to the accuracy thereof and same is submitted subject to errors, omissions, change of price, rentals or other conditions, prior sale, lease or financing or withdrawal without notice. All dimensions and squarefootage are approximate. For the most exact dimensions and square footage please hire your own architect or engineer.We are an equal housing opportunity provider. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, creed, color, national origin,sexual orientation, lawful source of income, military status, sex, gender identity, age, disability, familiar status (having children under age 18), or religion.
